snippet: Despite the Packer Collegiate Institute’s stated desire to keep itself brownstone Brooklyn, it possesses many of the attributes of a high-striving New York City private school.
abstract: Packer Collegiate Institute in Brooklyn Heights possesses many of the attributes of state-of-the-art New York City private schools, but remains dedicated to its Brooklyn roots.
lead_paragraph: Despite the Packer Collegiate Institute’s stated desire to keep itself brownstone Brooklyn, it possesses many of the attributes of a high-striving New York City private school.

headline.seo: As Packer Collegiate Raises Profile, Identity Questions Arise
headline.main: As a Private School in Brooklyn Raises Its Profile, Questions of Identity Arise
headline.print_headline: As Private School in Brooklyn Raises Its Profile, Questions of Identity Arise
